name: Mahjong Gokuu Tenjiku 99
overview: Mahjong Goku Tenjiku '99 is a mahjong game (an updated version of the Mahjong Goku Tenjiku released in 1994) based on the Journey to the West chinese novel, the game features the novel characters and the player can take the role of any of the main 4 characters and go through a journey in which he will have to defeat their enemies in mahjong games.
